title: Trump administration scraps multimillion-dollar solar projects in Puerto Rico as grid crumbles
description: The Trump administration canceled solar projects in Puerto Rico, impacting low-income families amid ongoing power outages.
content: The Trump administration canceled solar projects in Puerto Rico, impacting low-income families amid ongoing power outages.
